content.html: When at Uber, I remember this change to make sure a female interviewer is present on every hiring loop. The strangest thing happened. We started rejecting candidates just because they were unwilling to make eye contact with the female interviewer or acknowledge their presence.
content.value:
When at Uber, I remember this change to make sure a female interviewer is present on every hiring loop.

The strangest thing happened.

We started rejecting candidates just because they were unwilling to make eye contact with the female interviewer or acknowledge their presence.
